title.rendered: Apply Now | Thompson Rivers University Admission Requirements 2024

content.rendered:
Thompson Rivers University Admission Requirements, The general Requirements, Canadian resident fees,$30.42, International Students fees $100.00

Thompson Rivers University Admission is ongoing for all students who are interested to apply for Admission.

Thompson Rivers University Admission Requirements

General Admission Requirement is as follows

The Basic General Requirements for Thompson Rivers University:

The Thompson Rivers University programs generally require a BC high school graduation or corresponding. Exceptions to this constraint are shown in the program admission necessities.

You may have the equivalent grade of BC high school graduation if you have completed the below programs:

The BC Adult Graduation (Adult Dogwood) diploma, or formerly the ABE Provincial diploma.

the General Education Diploma (GED)

English language necessities

  • Types of admittance

Open (Non-Competitive) Admission

restricted entrance:

Selective (viable) Admission

  • The Program exact entrance necessities
  • Provincial and supplementary admission equivalents

The Alberta, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland, Maya Scotia, Ontario or Yukon

Quebec, and have the student might have completed one full academic year at CEGEP

What if you don’t meet the program necessities? This is one of the question you could likely ask yourself when you are unable to meet the a specific program requirements to clear your worries kindly visit the Future Students team

Application Fees for both Canadian citizen and International applicants

  • Canadian resident or permanent resident: $30.42
  • International students: $100.00

Note that:  The appliance fees are non-refundable

steps to apply for a visa click here Canada Visitor Visa, How To Apply for Temporary Resident Visa
